title: League Of Legends Crash
body:
When i first tried to install league of legends onto my computer the installation would reach 70% and say Updating UI and my computer would crash.
My PC becomes completely unusable And i have to hard restart can anyone help?

Computer Specs: 
CPU: AMD FX 8350
Videos Card: ASUS GTX 770
OS: Windows 7 Home Premium 64 bit

replies.body:
Hi IAmRivenTheExile!

I have heard of palyers not being able to patch once you hit 70%, but its incredibly rare to hear of the computer straight up crashing during patching.  Since I would not even know where to begin as to why this is happening, can you reply back and [attach a copy of your DxDiag](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq5)?

It should let me look into this issue a bit further for you!
